title: Online Learning Mathematical Information Literacy Expansion Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage and elementary-level mathematical knowledge
context.additional_context: Aims to improve the ability to effectively search for and evaluate mathematics-related information in online learning environments. Mobile-optimized content delivery is essential, considering situations without PC access.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and utilize at least three credible online information sources related to mathematics.
Learners can apply search strategies for solving mathematical problems on mobile devices and adapt them to practical tasks.
Learners can document the process of critically analyzing the credibility of information sources during project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
